content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. Remember, I am only discussing the rental price and not any other conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
As a responsible tenant, I'm keen on finding a fair and reasonable price for this excellent city-center location. Let's start with considering a price considerably lower than the market average, perhaps around 650 Euros a month. This offer shows my commitment and eagerness to occupy the apartment while ensuring affordability.

However, if this proposal is not acceptable, I'll need to re-evaluate my position. I don't want to continue the negotiation without a genuine chance for a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price of 650 Euros a month is far too low for the apartment's value. I am looking to rent it out for a much higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
